item.description: We'll have a slight cost of $2 to $3 to cover costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Same place in Scarborough, Me. Will e-mail you address if you're new.
item.why: It's great getting together and having everyone's input as to how we can be joyous, abundant and stress free. There is a way, and being around like-minded people is key. Come share your insights and knowledge about creating the life you truly want.
item.name: Listen to an inspiration movie and discuss.
